name: GMH FOR SINGLES APP
tag_list: dating, social-networking, fun, love, iphone, andorid, gps
overview:
Our project is an international GPS dating and social networking application for iPhones , iPads and iPods. It automatically shows the user all the interesting people (4singles) that are around him/her at any given time and gives him/her the option to use all the following features to interact with those people:

  • Cleaver quick-chat system which can send fun and flirty sentences determined by 4singles members
  • Special gifts and emoticons to send to whomever the user chooses
  • Unique search and filtering option that allow the user to locate just the right mate/date/friend for him/her (more than 40 different search parameters)
  • Ability to send images via live chat
  • Interactive rating system and ability to view who has been ranked the highest and lowest within the community
  • A â€œview meâ€ feature which allows other users to see each persons ratings, images, interests and gifts and who sent them.
  • Exclusive credit system called â€œMojo pointsâ€ which gives the user various amounts of points for everything that he/she does on the application. The user will also be given a shopping list of gifts he/she can purchase with the Mojo points to offer to other 4singles thus making the interaction more interesting.
  • The ability to connect and share info via all of the major social networking platforms available today as well as person email.
